name: gusplease
text: Interaction between Lyle and Philippe is always amazing, and this is probably the most amazing example.

name: onepapertiger
text:
http://achewood.com/index.php?date=05122004
ONSTAD: WE NEED MORE OF THIS.
written in flaming gasoline, on lawn

name: cpnglxynchos
text: his lawn.

name: catachresis
text: I hope some Achewood-savvy TV writer works Lyle's last line into an actual police drama show. I'd be so happy.

name: jhunt
text: "Heated-up marijuana" is an awesome phrasing.

name: fancyrat
text: I like to think that Phillipe pronounces it "Mary-juh-wanna"

name: centipede_damascus
text: Man, Phillipe really does hate that marijuana.

name: dovey
text: IT'S ILLEGAL

name: woodenteeth
text: sometimes it seems you only every reply when your avatar makes the comment that much more orrsum.

name: manxome
text:
I had the same thought, in the same context.


So... you wanna see a movie or summin'?

name: woodenteeth
text: Can't we just go straight to the sex? I've got an early start.

name: nurdbot
text: Panel 4, the sarcastic Lye eyebrow quirk is seen. Humankind is saved apon giving such a treasure.

name: qatipay
text: see, I think it just makes him look kind of chastened, which seems weird.

name: lateadopter
text: I thought he was confused. I don't think Lyle can be chastened, and especially not by Philippe. He told Philippe to shove it , gave him a gut-punch for Christmas , and used him as a bowling ball . Lyle would probably seeks criticism from Philippe as a form of validation.

name: qatipay
text: yeah, chastened can't be right. it's LYLE.

name: nutmeg
text: don't forget that Lyle called Phillipe a FAG via custom singing car-horn.

name: tekende
text: It caused problems in the community.

name: finish_him
text: Lyle is surprised and confused that the five year old is unfamiliar with the purpose and operation of a bong.  Seems pretty in-character.

name: achewoodno1fan
text: A comment left by achewoodno1fan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Tinhand, hellofditties, miaou)

name: achewoodno1fan
text: A comment left by achewoodno1fan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Tinhand, HeyMan, slalvation, Darthemed)

name: tinhand
text: Lyles solution to the immorality of illegal activity is an excellent one. Especially since getting high never really hurt anyone that much anyway. Bill Hicks has said some excellent things on the subject.

name: killerlimpet
text:
Bill Hicks is the reason that I am not scared.

Ever.

name: 1000hz
text: C.O.P.S.

name: songbirdspectre
text:
i laughed. so. hard. at C.O.P.S.

philippe, you are rad.

name: peterjoel
text: To a Philippe, the worst consequence for your actions is to be yelled at.

name: tetrisattack
text: Lyle's smokin' bongs

name: spinynorman
text: When Lyle and Philippe interact Lyle usually winds up voicing some fictional character for him.

name: echidnaboy
text: I count four punchlines, all from Lyle. That dude delivers .

name: jonnay
text: Heated up marijuana... Lyle totally has a vape!

name: zzzleepy
text: yay philippe came up with the best dope slang ever!

name: zzzleepy
text: if i ever made statements calling it smoking dope instead of heated up-marijuana, they were made by an incorrect life i no longer maintain.

name: aki
text: Is good.  These days dope implies heroin, so we hope you're not riding the dragon.

name: intelligentblue
text: I hide heated-up marijuana in many things, up to,and including, my lungs.

name: hellofditties
text: No Philippe, you are not boring! You... are... rad!

name: chachibenji
text:
Reading the idea of heated up mary just makes me think of of some kind of luxurious chilled mary or something.
I guess what I am trying to say is that I think marijuana is kind of like merlot.

name: rhadamanthus
text: As a cannabis connoisseur, I feel the highest level of enjoyment in terms of taste and prolonged sessioning comes from room-temperature mary, such as comes through a behosed vaporizer.

name: woodenteeth
text: Once again, Lyle proves his incredible wit even in light of his horrifying alcohol abuse and ability to hold little more than a "skullin'" job.

name: sharpdresseddan
text: I somehow always hear Lyle as having a gruff voice, namely Daniel Day Lewis; straight outta Gangs of New York. He's even got the moustache!

name: rowdy
text: lyle's face in panel four is a perfect transition between serious and fed up with the conversation.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Best Lyle expression ever in panel 4.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Never call a bong a dumb invention. It may be the savior of us all.
